scenes.action_text: BLINK TWICE Written by Zoï¿½ Kravitz & E.T. Feigenbaum 4/12/23 OVER BLACK WE HEAR: DRIP. EXT. JUNGLE - DAY (Existing shot) LIZARD SITS ON A ROCK WATCHING... SOMETHING DRIP. DRIP. DRIP. INT. BATHROOM - DAY CLOSE ON A GRIMY LEAKY SINK. DRIP. DRIP. DRIP. SPARK! Close on: A YELLOW LIGHTER with a lil smilie face on it LIGHTING a stick of incense. FRIDA blows out
